abstract: As reports surface that Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘s investment bank in New York, is threatening to leave the firm, speculation on the whys and wherefores of the situation is increasing.
lead_paragraph: As reports surface that Kenneth D. Moelis, the president of UBS‘s investment bank in New York, is threatening to leave the firm, speculation on the whys and wherefores of the situation is increasing.

headline.main: TXU, EchoStar Deals May Have Role in UBS Turmoil
